attributes.additional_details:
The govenrment through Elizabeth Truss's document 'More Great Childcare' are proposing the following changes:

* to decrease adult to child ratios within childcare settings

* to decrease the Local Authorities role in quality assurance

*to decrease space per child ratio

As an owner/manager of a priavate day nursery I feel strongly that these proposed changes will have a negative impact on the quality of care within Early Years settings.

If you agree, please sign this petition.
